chat_history.message:
Hello,

My iPhone 12 has a problem:
The phone has been shutting down unexpectedly and taking a long time to respond to the power-on command; having to leave it for several hours of 'rest' until it started responding to the power-on command again. It's been happening very frequently since a few weeks ago, but in this last occasion there was no way to turn it back on, staying two days off and unable to boot up.

Thanks,

Hola, agente
El vendedor no puede proceder al reenvío debido al siguiente motivo:
El artículo está conectado a iCloud o Google.
Se ha añadido más información en este mensaje: Dear Backcare,

The phone is iCloud locked, please assist the customer in unlinking their iCloud account from the phone.

Regards,
KJ

Dear ecomobile

My name is Natally, nice to meet you! I hope this message finds you amazing.

The customer has already disconnected the iCloud account, please, let me know about the repair.

Thanks a lot!

Regards,
Natally from the Back Care Team

Hola, agente
El vendedor no puede proceder al reenvío debido al siguiente motivo:
Otros.
Se ha añadido más información en este mensaje: Dear Backcare,

Can I confirm if the customer had dropped the device during use? This information determines whether the device is still under warranty.

Regards,
KJ

Hi ecomobile,

Once more Natally.

The customer haven't reported any damaged.

Just a friendly reminder that the customer is waiting for their >>repair<<.
We have listed some issues with their corresponding resolutions here in case these are preventing you from carrying out the refund. Please use the "Report a Problem" button on the bottom of the screen to declare an issue with the customer's return and stop a refund from being made on your behalf.

1. In case of a delivery issue: https://backmarketportal.force.com/ssc/s/article/How-to-manage-a-transport-issue-lost-stolen-damaged-parcel

2. In case of a user account (e.g. iCloud, Google) still connected: 
iCloud: 
https://backmarketportal.force.com/ssc/s/article/What-to-do-with-a-device-locked-to-iCloud

Google: https://backmarketportal.force.com/ssc/s/article/How-to-manage-a-product-blocked-with-an-account-Android-Google

3. In case of a warranty exclusion: https://backmarketportal.force.com/ssc/s/article/Declare-and-manage-warranty-exclusion

Please provide a solution to the customer within the next (1) business day, or unfortunately we’ll have to refund the order, according to the Back Market Quality Charter.

Thanks for your help in keeping our shared customers happy!
Natally Back Market customer Care

Dear Backcare, 

We take note of your message and will proceed with the repair.

Regards,
JH
